description: Collaboration between the Computer Perception Lab (LPC) at UFCG and PactoMais to develop AI-driven document and facial authentication tools for pharmacy management systems.
roleDescription: Conducted tests and benchmarking for signature verification services, implemented and evaluated open-source document rectifiers, and integrated facial recognition services into a mobile application.

additionalRoles.title: Computer Vision Developer
additionalRoles.text: Developed and tested an open-source image rectifier using Python and OpenCV to automatically detect and crop documents from mobile images.

additionalRoles.title: Mobile Integration Engineer
additionalRoles.text: Integrated a facial recognition microservice (developed in Java) with the Android-based FirmaFácil mobile app using Android Studio and JavaScript.

additionalRoles.title: AI Validation Analyst
additionalRoles.text: Tested and measured the performance of the Revai signature comparison service, ensuring the reliability of the authentication process.
